title: Ticket #6771: Debian package does not follow policy
description:
This ticket is intended to help the process of keeping the htcondor package up-to-date on debian.org. They will probably want you to eliminate or silence the following warnings. You can google them to find resolutions if the name isn't sufficiently obvious.

The errors can be silences with an overrides file, e.g.:

https://github.com/cvmfs/cvmfs/blob/devel/packaging/debian/cvmfs/cvmfs.lintian-overrides 

[execute3022:pkg] lintian htcondor_8.7.9-0.445021_amd64.deb
W: htcondor: package-name-doesnt-match-sonames libchirp-client libcondor-utils-8-7-9 libcondorapi
W: htcondor: package-installs-into-obsolete-dir etc/bash_completion.d/ : ^etc/bash_completion.d/ -> usr/share/bash-completion/completions (see also https://bugs.debian.org/776954)
W: htcondor: package-installs-into-obsolete-dir etc/bash_completion.d/condor : ^etc/bash_completion.d/ -> usr/share/bash-completion/completions (see also https://bugs.debian.org/776954)
W: htcondor: manpage-has-bad-whatis-entry usr/share/man/man1/bosco_cluster.1.gz
W: htcondor: manpage-has-bad-whatis-entry usr/share/man/man1/bosco_findplatform.1.gz
W: htcondor: manpage-has-bad-whatis-entry usr/share/man/man1/bosco_install.1.gz
W: htcondor: manpage-has-bad-whatis-entry ... use --no-tag-display-limit to see all (or pipe to a file/program)
W: htcondor: manpage-has-errors-from-man usr/share/man/man1/condor_gather_info.1.gz 22: warning [p 1, 5.3i]: cannot adjust line
W: htcondor: manpage-has-errors-from-man usr/share/man/man1/condor_ssh_to_job.1.gz 110: warning: macro `..' not defined
W: htcondor: binary-without-manpage usr/sbin/AzureGAHPServer
W: htcondor: binary-without-manpage usr/bin/classad_functional_tester
W: htcondor: binary-without-manpage usr/bin/classad_version
W: htcondor: binary-without-manpage ... use --no-tag-display-limit to see all (or pipe to a file/program)
W: htcondor: shlib-without-versioned-soname usr/lib/libcondorapi.so libcondorapi.so
W: htcondor: shlib-without-versioned-soname usr/lib/libcondor_utils_8_7_9.so libcondor_utils_8_7_9.so
W: htcondor: shlib-without-versioned-soname usr/lib/libchirp_client.so libchirp_client.so
remarks:
2019-Apr-10 15:19:49 by pfc:
I'm assuming solely based on the age of this ticket that it's safe to demote to priority 5. If I'm wrong, please speak up.
creator: tpdownes
